Text:
Thanks for the post.
Your driver pack helped resolve a couple issues I was having with a HP Laptop. I tried numerous times to get drivers off of their site to no avail. Your driver pack fixed the video problems and the processor driver problem. 
Thanks again, and keep up the great work.

Thanks for uploading for everybody, but it didn't work for me. 
It muted my speakers and headphones when the volume was turned on.
I had to restore my laptop to the day before I used this.
